name: Outmoused
description:
Avoid the cheese, embrace the traps! Outmoused is a top down puzzle adventure game in which you play as a mouse that has to ruin the research of a scientist!

Controls: WASD to move, Spacebar to advance dialogue and certain actions. Stuck in a level? Eat the cheese to reset!

This game was created by Tomyatemo and Take it Isi! for the Wowie Jam 3.0. The theme was Failure is Progress.

Sound Effects by Filippo Vicarelli and JDWasabi.
Font: Pixeled by OmegaPC777.
